author: sasharma6
body:
" Poblem : There were missing EwkElecDQM & EwkMuonDQM modules in the physics directory of samples ZEE, ZMM, WE WM. 
Which leads to no validation of CMSSW releases for 81X and few 80X.
Solution implemented : As suggested by the group people we have removed the trigger part from both EwkElec and EwkMuon DQM codes and using CMSSW 810pre9 we obtained the plots.
Things to do: To approve the code and check whether it is properly merged"
title: Solution for broken SMP DQM codes for validations
